parse.title: List of plain English words and phrases

text.*:
This is a list of plain English words and phrases and the longer, more cumbersome words they can replace. The problem word is listed first; the plain English alternative follows.

Plain English (or plain language) is communication in English that emphasizes clarity and brevity, and avoids technical language—particularly in official government or business communication. It uses simple, familiar words instead of lengthy, formal words,[1] avoids jargon, prefers positive words to negative words,[2] and prefers strong verbs to be verbs.[3]

A[edit]

  • above-mentioned, above-listed, before-mentioned, aforementioned – (omit)[4][5]
  • abundance – enough, plenty, (or specific amount)[6]
  • accede to – allow, agree to[6]
  • accelerate – speed up[6]
  • accentuate – stress[6]
  • accommodation – room[7]
  • accompany – go with,[8] with[6]
  • accomplish – do[8]
  • accorded – given[8]
  • accordingly – thus, so[8][9]
  • accrue – add, gain[8]
  • accurate – right[8]
  • acquiesce – agree[6]
  • acquire – get[6]
  • additional – extra[8][10][9]
  • address – discuss[8]
  • addressees – you[8]
  • adjacent to – Next to[8]
  • adjustment – change, alteration[6]
  • admissible – allowed, accepted[6]
  • advantageous – helpful[8]
  • adversely impact on – hurt, set back[8]
  • advise – tell[8][10]
  • afford an opportunity – allow, let[8]
  • aggregate – total[6]
  • aircraft – airplane (USA) / aeroplane (UK)[8] ("Plane" can also mean "flat surface" and a woodworking tool; the word "airplane" avoids this confusion. The word "aircraft" can be used if you need to specifically include balloons, blimps, gliders, etc.; it's the simplest word for the whole category of aerial vehicles.)
  • alleviate – ease, reduce[6]
  • allocate – divide[8]
  • along the lines of – like, as in[11]
  • alternatively – or[11]
  • ameliorate – improve, help[11]
  • an absence of – no, none[6]
  • and particularly – particularly[12]
  • and/or – use either "and" or "or."[8][13]
  • anticipate – expect[8]
  • a number of – some[8]
  • applicant – you[10]
  • application – use[11]
  • apparent – clear, plain[8]
  • apprehend – arrest[14]
  • appreciable – many[8]
  • appropriate – proper, right[8]
  • approximate – about[8][15]
  • arrive onboard – arrive[8]
  • as a means of – to[8]
  • ascertain – find out, learn[8]
  • as per our telephone conversation of this date – as we discussed this afternoon[16][17]
  • as prescribed by – in, under[8]
  • as far as ... is concerned – (omit)[18][19]
  • as to– of, on, with, for, to, by, in, into[20]
  • as yet, as of yet – yet[21]
  • assist, assistance – help[8][15]
  • at its discretion – can, may[11]
  • attain – meet[8], reach
  • attempt – try[8]
  • at the present time, at this time, at this point in time, at the moment – now[8][15][22][11]
  • attributable to – because[11]
  • at your earliest convenience – as soon as you can[16]
  • authorize – allow, let[23]

B[edit]

  • basis, on a – (omit)[24], or replace "on an X basis" by "X-ly"
  • be advised – (omit)[8]
  • because of the fact that – because, since[25][26]
  • beg – ask[16]
  • belated – late[27]
  • beneficial – helpful, useful[27]
  • bestow – give, award[27]
  • by means of – by, with[8][22]
  • by reason of – because[22]
  • by virtue of – by, under[22]
  • beverage – drink[15]

C[edit]

  • capable of, am/is/are – can
  • capability – ability[8]
  • case of, in the – (omit)[28]
  • caveat – warning[8]
  • cease – stop[15]
  • chauffeur – driver[29]
  • clearly, obviously – (omit)[30]
  • close proximity – near[8]
  • combat environment – combat[8]
  • combined – joint[8]
  • commence – begin or start[8][31][10]
  • completely revoke – revoke[32]
  • comply with – follow[8][10]
  • complete – fill in[10]
  • component – part[8]
  • comprise – form[8]
  • conceal – hide[7]
  • concerning – about, on[8]
  • consensus, of opinion, consensus, general – consensus[33]
  • consequently – so[8][10][9]
  • consolidate – join, merge[8]
  • constitutes – is, forms, makes up[8]
  • contains – has[8]
  • convene – meet[8]
  • corridor – hall[15]
  • currently – (omit), now[8]

D[edit]

  • deem – believe, think[8]
  • delete – cut, drop[8]
  • demonstrate – prove, show[8]
  • depart – leave, go[8][15]
  • designate – choose, name[8]
  • desire – want, wish[8]
  • despite the fact that – although[25][26]
  • despite his writing the book (for example): although he wrote the book
  • determine – decide, figure, find[8]
  • disclose – show[8]
  • different – After a number, this word is often unnecessary.
  • discontinue – drop, stop[8]
  • disseminate – give, issue, pass, send[8]
  • does not have – lacks[34]
  • does not include – excludes, omits[34]
  • due to the fact that – because, since[8][26]
  • duly (authorized, signed) – (omit)[35]
  • during the period, during the time that – during, while[8][19]

E[edit]

  • each and every – (omit)[36]
  • early beginnings – beginnings, early days[37]
  • each...apiece – each[37]
  • economical – cheap[38]
  • effect modifications – make changes[8]
  • elect – choose, pick[8]
  • eliminate – cut, drop, end[8]
  • else but, else than – but[39]
  • elucidate – explain[40][41]
  • emphasize – stress[38]
  • employ – use[8]
  • enclosed please find – I have enclosed[42][16]
  • encounter – meet[8]
  • endeavor – try[8][15]
  • end (result, product) – omit[43]
  • enquiry – question[38]
  • ensure – make sure[8][10]
  • entitlement – right[38]
  • enumerate – count[8]
  • equally as – equally[44]
  • equipments – equipment[8]
  • equitable – fair[8]
  • equivalent – equal[38]
  • establish – set up, prove, show[8]
  • evaluate – test, check[38]
  • evidenced – showed[8]
  • evident – (omit), clear[8]
  • evince – show, prove[38]
  • excluding – except[38]
  • exclusively – only[38]
  • exhibit – show[8]
  • expedite – hurry[8][41]
  • expeditious – fast, quick[8]
  • expend – spend[8]
  • expertise – ability[8]
  • expiration – end[8]

F[edit]

  • facilitate – ease, help[8]
  • fauna – animals[8]
  • feasible – workable[8]
  • females – women[8]
  • finalize – complete, finish[8][45]
  • first(ly), second(ly), third(ly) – first, second, third[46]
  • first and foremost – first[47]
  • flora – plants[8]
  • following – after[48]
  • for a period of – for[8][19]
  • for example,______etc. – for example, such as[8]
  • forfeit – lose, give up[8]
  • formulate – plan[48]
  • for the purpose of, – to[22]
  • for the reason that, – to[22]
  • forward – send[8][10]
  • frequently – often[8]
  • function – act, role, work[8]
  • furnish – give, send[8]

H[edit]

  • has a duty to – must[49]
  • has a requirement for – needs[8]
  • herein, heretofore, herewith, thereof, wherefore, wherein –(omit)[8][46]
  • honest truth – truth[50]
  • however – but, yet[8][51]

I[edit]

  • identical – same[8]
  • identify –find, name[8]
  • identify with –agree, understand[52]
  • if and when – use either word; not both[53]
  • immediately – at once[8]
  • impacted – affected,changed[8]
  • implement – carry out, start[54]
  • in accordance with – by, under[8][10][22]
  • in addition – also, besides, too[8]
  • in all likelihood – probably[55]
  • in an effort to – to[8]
  • inasmuch – since[8][22]
  • in a timely manner – on time, promptly[8]
  • in between – between[56]
  • inception – start[8]
  • in connection with – with, about[22]
  • incumbent upon – must[8]
  • indicate – say, state, or show[8][56][15]
  • indication – sign[8]
  • individual – person[57][15]
  • in excess of – more than[10]
  • in favor of – for[22]
  • initial – first[8]
  • initiate – start[8]
  • in lieu of – instead[8]
  • in light of the fact that – because[16][25][26]
  • in many cases – often[26]
  • in order that – for, so[8]
  • in order to – to[8][57][25][22]
  • inquire – ask[15]
  • in regard(s) to – about, concerning, on[8][15]
  • in relation to – about, with, to[8][22]
  • in some instances – sometimes[26]
  • inside of – inside[58]
  • institute legal proceedings against, bring action against – sue[14]
  • inter alia – (omit)[8]or use "among others"[58]
  • interface – meet, work with[8][59]
  • in terms of –(omit)[58][60]
  • interpose no objection – don't object[8]
  • in the amount of – for[8]
  • in the case of – when[26]
  • in the event of – if[8][25][10][60]
  • in the majority of instances – usually[19]
  • in the nature of – like[60]
  • in the near future – shortly, soon[8]
  • in the process of – (omit)[8]
  • in view of – since[8]
  • in view of the above – so[8]
  • irregardless – regardless[15][61]
  • is applicable to – applies to[8]
  • is authorized to – may[8]
  • is in consonance with – agrees with, follows[8]
  • is responsible for – (omit) handles[8]
  • it appears – seems[8]
  • it is – (omit)[8]
  • it is essential – must, need to[8]
  • it is requested – please, we request, I request[8]
  • it is important to add that, in this regard it is of significance that, it may be recalled that, it is interesting to point out that – (omit)[30]

L[edit]

  • liaison – discussion[8]
  • -ly (doubtless, fast, ill, much, seldom, thus) – (omit)[62]
  • last will and testament – will[63]

M[edit]

  • magnitude – size[8]
  • maintain – keep, support[8]
  • majority – most (except for voting)[64]
  • make a mockery of – (omit)[65]
  • make an attempt, make an effort – try[66]
  • make reference to – refer[67]
  • maximum – greatest, largest, most[8]
  • mental attitude – attitude[68]
  • merge – combine[69]
  • methodology – method[8]
  • minimize – decrease[8]
  • minimum – least, smallest[8]
  • modify – change[8]
  • monitor – check, watch[8]
  • month + of + year – March 2013[70]
  • moreover – what's more[71]
  • multiple – many[72]

N[edit]

  • nature, of a – (omit)[73]
  • necessitate – cause, need[8]
  • nevertheless – still, besides, even so[71]
  • notify – let know, tell[8]
  • not able – unable[34]
  • not accept – reject[34]
  • not certain – uncertain[34]
  • not unlike – similar, alike[34]
  • not many – few[34]
  • not often – seldom, rarely[34]
  • not the same – different[34]
  • not...unless, not...except – only if[34]
  • not...until – only when[34]
  • not later than May 10 – by May 10, before May 11[8]
  • notwithstanding – in spite of, still[8]
  • now comes – (omit)[74]
  • null and void – use either "null" or "void"[75][76][77]
  • numerous – many[8][78][55]

O[edit]

  • objective – aim, goal[8]
  • obligate – bind, compel[8]
  • observe – see on a _________basis (omit)[8]
  • obtain – get[79]
  • off of – off[80]
  • on request – if you ask[10]
  • on a daily basis – daily
  • on a X basis – Xly (where X is an adjective)
  • on the basis of – by, from[60]
  • on the contrary – but, so[71]
  • on the grounds that – (omit)[81]
  • on the other hand – (omit);[81] but, so[71]
  • on the part of – by[82][81]
  • operate – run, use, work[8]
  • optimum – best, greatest, most[8]
  • option – choice, way[8]
  • orientate – orient[82][83]
  • ...out (calculate, cancel, distribute, segregate, separate) – omit[84]
  • outside of – outside[82]
  • overall (unless it means the garment) – (omit)[85]
  • oversight [v] – oversee[86]
  • owing to the fact that – because, since[25][26]

P[edit]

  • parameters – limits (except in mathematical and computer-programming uses)[8][87]
  • participate – take part[8]
  • particulars – details[10]
  • pass away – die[15]
  • per annum – a year[10]
  • perchance – perhaps[88]
  • perform – do[8]
  • permit – let[8]
  • pertaining to – about, of, on[8]
  • perspire – sweat[15]
  • peruse – read[15]
  • PIN number – PIN[89]
  • place – put[15]
  • portion – part[8]
  • possess – have, own[8]
  • point in time, particular point in time – time, point, now, moment[90]
  • potentiality – potential[91]
  • practicable – practical[8]
  • preclude – prevent[8]
  • preowned – used[92]
  • preliminary to, previous to, previously, prior to – before[8][93][15][25][60]
  • preparatory to – to prepare for[93][10]
  • prior to – before[citation needed]
  • prioritize – rank;[8] set or make priorities[94]
  • proceed – do, go ahead, try[8][15]
  • procure – (omit)[8]
  • proficiency – skill[8]
  • promulgate – issue, publish[8]
  • provide – give, offer, say[8]
  • provided that – if[8][95][96]
  • provide guidance for – guide[8]
  • purchase – buy[8][15][97]
  • pursuant to – by, following, per, under;[8] in response to, in carrying out, as required by[98][16]

Q[edit]

  • question as to whether, question of whether – question whether[99]
  • quite puzzling – baffling[50]

R[edit]

  • reason ... is because – because[100]
  • refer back – refer[101]
  • reflect – say, show[8]
  • regard as being – regard as[102]
  • regarding – about, of, on[8][97]
  • relative to – about, on[8]
  • relocate – move[8]
  • remain – stay[8]
  • remainder – rest[8]
  • remuneration – pay, payment[8]
  • render – give, make[8]
  • represents – is[8]
  • request – ask[8]
  • require – must, need[8]
  • requirement – need,[8] rule[103]
  • reside, residence – live, house[8][104]
  • respectively – (omit)[105]
  • retain – keep[8]
  • retire – go to bed[15]
  • rigorous – harsh, rigid, severe[8]

S[edit]

  • said, some, such, same – the, this, that[8][106][16][5][107]
  • selection – choice[8]
  • separate – After a number, this word is often unnecessary.
  • set forth in – in[8]
  • shall – must[76][108][109]
  • should you wish – if you want[97]
  • similar to – like[8]
  • solicit – ask for, request[8]
  • state-of-the-art – latest[8]
  • strategize – plan[110]
  • subject – the, this, your[8]
  • submit – give, send[8]
  • subsequent, subsequently, subsequent to – later, next, after, then[8][111][15][25][60]
  • substantial – large, much[8]
  • successfully complete – complete, pass[8]
  • sufficient – enough[8][15]

T[edit]

  • take action to – (omit)[8]
  • terminate – end, stop[8][40][97][41]
  • than was formerly the case – now[26]
  • the month of – (omit)[8]
  • there are – (omit)[8]
  • therefore – thus, so[8][71]
  • therein – there[8]
  • there is – (omit)[8]
  • the undersigned – I[8]
  • the use of – (omit)[8]
  • this activity, command – us, we[8]
  • timely – prompt[8]
  • time period – (either one)[8]
  • to be violative of – violate[112]
  • took advantage of – preyed[50]
  • to wit – (omit)[113]
  • transpire (unless referring to plant transpiration) – happen[15]
  • transmit – send[8][14]
  • type – (omit)[8]

U[edit]

  • under the provisions of – under[8]
  • until such time as – until[8][19]
  • utilize, utilization – use[8][40][14][41]

V[edit]

  • validate – confirm[8]
  • variation – change[114]
  • various different – "various" or "different"[115]
  • very – (omit)[116]
  • viable – practical, workable[8]

W[edit]

  • warrant – call for, permit[8]
  • we are in receipt of – we've received[16][10]
  • whereas – because, since[8]
  • whether or not – whether,[117] if
  • whosoever, whomsoever – whoever, whomever[118]
  • with a view to – by, from[60]
  • with reference to, with regard to – about[8][60]
  • with respect to – on, about[60]
  • with the exception of – except for[8]
  • with the minimum of delay – quickly (or say when)[117]
  • witnessed – saw[8]

Y[edit]

  • you are requested – please[119]
  • your attention is drawn – please see, please note[119]
  • your office – you[8]

Symbols[edit]

  • / (slash) – and, or[8]
